8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

gadget-ratios-setter

Generic function

gadget-ratios-setter ratios splitter => ratios

Sets the ratios of the windows in splitter. This generic function lets you set the position of a splitter.

The splitter argument is an instance of type <splitter>. The ratios argument is an instance of type
false-or(<sequence>). Set ratios to #f if you do not care what ratios are used.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
